name: super kitty tales
description:
quick and silly little virtual pet about the kittens of amy and alex from the super cat tales series.

the game was made in 3 days for the super cat jam contest, so this is why it is very basic. It's one of the first game i really managed to terminate though.

i hope you will enjoy playing it for more than 10 seconds.

to customize the kitty, the background and the platform, pressthe back key, the menu is really straightforward.

The game was made in RFO-basic, a very cool coding language. if you want to, the interpreted code is unmodified, unobfuscated and uncrypted inside the apk, you can see it if you want.
